text: Jason Shah (born 14 December 1987) is a British-Indian actor and fitness model. == Filmography == * Fitoor (2016) * Bigg Boss 10 as Himself/Wild Card Contestant (2016) * Sabaash Naidu as Officer Burt Jackson (2016) * Dev DD as Philip (2017) * Chandrashekhar (TV series) as John Nott-Bower (2018) * Thugs of Hindostan as East India Company Officer (2018) * Jhansi Ki Rani (2019 TV series) as Hugh Ross, 1st Baron Strathnairn (2019) * Barrister Babu as Officer Sir John Greenwood (2020) * State of Siege: 26/11 web series released digitally on ZEE5 Platform (2020) * Dev DD 2 web series was released digitally on ZEE5 Platform (2021) * Swaraj (TV series) as Vasco Da Gama == References == == Other websites == * Category:1987 births Category:Living people
title: Jason Shah
